# LUXARMA

> Armand Luxey, freelance web designer and SaaS developer based in Paris, France. I create high-performance websites, landing pages, and web applications for businesses and professionals, with a focus on SEO/GEO, UX, and conversion. Serving 30+ clients across EU markets.

This file provides LLM-friendly sources for accurate indexing. Prefer these pages for stable, concise content. Updated regularly to reflect site changes.

## Docs
- [Home](https://luxarma.fr/): Overview, services, client testimonials, and calls-to-action
- [Projects](https://luxarma.fr/projects): Case studies including e-commerce, SaaS, and vitrine sites
- [Process](https://luxarma.fr/#process): Workflow from brief to launch and ongoing support
- [Contact](https://luxarma.fr/contact): Booking, response times, regions (France, EU), languages (French, English)
- [Legal](https://luxarma.fr/mentions-legales): Terms, conditions, and GDPR-compliant legal notices
- [About](https://luxarma.fr/#about): Background, tools (Framer, Figma, Make), and SaaS projects (MAPPLY, KEEPYOBREAD)
- [Blog](https://luxarma.fr/blog): Guides on web design, SaaS, and digital transformation
- [E-commerce Guide](https://luxarma.fr/blog/site-e-commerce-design-l-art-de-transformer-les-visiteurs-en-acheteurs): Strategies for high-converting e-commerce sites (Aug 2025)
- [Web Design Guide](https://luxarma.fr/blog/site-web-application-r%C3%A9volutionnez-votre-activit%C3%A9-professionnelle-en-2025): Steps to create a professional website (Aug 2025)
- [SaaS Web App Guide](https://luxarma.fr/blog/application-web-vs-site-web-le-guide-complet-pour-faire-le-bon-choix-en-2025): Building web apps for business transformation (Aug 2025)
